alternatives.transcript: So what is the most rewarding thing for you as a teacher?

If if the student doesn't learn it's not the students fault. It's the teacher's fault. It's my fault.

In other words, it's the job of the teacher to make it possible for the student to learn. We can't say. Oh, well, you don't have the right Karma or whatever. Okay. It's like if they're not getting it it's on me. It's not on that.
